unnormalised: Arre yaar, I went to Crawford Market yesterday to buy some Diwali decorations. The fairy lights were going for Rs. 250 a string, but the vendor quoted me ₹300 initially! Had to bargain him down, bhai. Then I picked up some diyas – the fancy ones with the mirror work were Rs. 50 per piece. Finished it off with a kilo of sweets for ₹400. Total damage? A cool ₹1000, give or take. Inflation, man!
normalised: Arre yaar, I went to Crawford Market yesterday to buy some Diwali decorations. The fairy lights were going for rupee two hundred and fifty a string, but the vendor quoted me rupee three hundred initially! Had to bargain him down, bhai. Then I picked up some diyas – the fancy ones with the mirror work were rupee fifty per piece. Finished it off with a kilogram of sweets for rupee four hundred. Total damage? A cool rupee one thousand, give or take. Inflation, man!
